name: agencies
description_CN: 表"agencies"记录了南京市各政府机构的信息
description_EN: The table "agencies" records information about various government agencies in Nanjing

name: buslines
description_CN: 表"buslines"记录了南京市各公交线路的信息
description_EN: The table "buslines" records information about all bus routes in Nanjing

name: districts
description_CN: 表"districts"记录了南京市各区的信息
description_EN: The table "districts" records information about all districts in Nanjing

name: greenspaces
description_CN: 表"greenspaces"记录南京市各块绿地的信息；绿地包含公园、风景名胜、旅游景点等
description_EN: The table "greenspaces" records information about all green spaces in Nanjing, including parks, scenic spots, tourist attractions, and more

description_CN: 表"hotels"记录南京市内各个宾馆的信息

name: rivers
description_CN: 表"rivers"记录南京市各个水系的信息；水系包含湖泊、河流、水库等
description_EN: The table "rivers" records information about all water systems in Nanjing, including lakes, rivers, reservoirs, and more

name: roads
description_CN: 表"roads"记录南京市内各段道路的信息
